siteMetadata.title: A platform to learn FAIR science practice and publishing
siteMetadata.description: This is a free, open source course on how to use different Data Science Techniques and Tools to make your science FAIR. It is made possible by a grant from the National Science Foundation RISE2324732. Contributions and comments on how to improve the course are welcome! To file an issue go to: https://github.com/LinkedEarth/LeapFROGS/issues
siteMetadata.slogan: An interactive course developed by LinkedEarth
